rows.label: tev026601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev026601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Satie about Skells.

rows.label: tev026601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev026601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Satie about recent developments.

rows.label: tev026601_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Satie about the Skell license test.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Satie about Skell insurance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Satie about Skell flight mode.

rows.label: tev026601_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Satie about Wolf.

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0001
rows.name:
You want to pilot one of these? Then you must be a
fellow Skell lover! I like you already.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0002
rows.name:
If you prove yourself as a BLADE, you'll get a crack
behind the stick one day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0003
rows.name:
Until then, you're just gonna have to work those legs
of yours and traverse Mira the old-fashioned way.
No pain, no gain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0004
rows.name:
Oh, and if you have any combat questions,
Wolf's your guy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0005
rows.name:
Just watch your tone, all right? He's a great instructor,
but they don't call him "the Nutcracker" for nothing.
...Or I don't, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0008
rows.name:
There you are, [ST:playername ].
Thanks for delivering those supplies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0009
rows.name:
Myles tells me that you're quite the BLADE.
I think you inspired him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0010
rows.name:
Now he's off on his next mission trying to outdo you
so he can come home with something to brag about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0011
rows.name:
I just hope he doesn't trash his Skell. It's fit for combat,
but I don't know about the pilot...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0012
rows.name:
I mean, would it kill him to treat Skells with just a
sliver of the respect someone like me or Christopher
has for them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0020
rows.name:
Hang on. Let me have a closer look at you...
Yeah... Mmm-hmm... Okay...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0021
rows.name:
Yessir! I'd say you're a winner! I'd trust you behind the
stick of a Skell any day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0022
rows.name:
I bet Wolf would give you his Nutcracker stamp of
approval, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0023
rows.name:
Why don't you drop by the barracks and talk to
Commander Vandham about getting a license?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0024
rows.name:
Knowing him, he'd probably leap at the chance to
put you through your paces.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0030
rows.name:
I'm so eager to get a Skell license that I've been
asking every BLADE I meet about the test.
You know? Just to get a leg up on it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0031
rows.name:
For example, did you know you can find the rock
armadillos you need for the Curator test in Noctilum?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0032
rows.name:
And the beagflea squashes are near Lake Basel in
Oblivia. But they're really hard to find...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0034
rows.name:
To be honest, the deeper I dig the more brutal the
test soundsâ€”but I'm determined to pass. Just watch![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0040
rows.name:
All our Skells are insured. If you check the "Skell
Insurance" column at the shop terminal, you'll see
a number.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0041
rows.name:
Until that number reaches zero, you can get your Skell
right back in the event it is destroyed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0042
rows.name:
But don't take that as a license to be reckless!
Skells are pricey, and you need to take care of them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0043
rows.name:
Don't be like Myles and let yours break down in
the middle of Primordia, or I guarantee a good nut-
cracking from Wolf.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0048
rows.name:
Is Lin actually a god? How did she manage to come
up with something like that? It's incredible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0049
rows.name:
With flight mode, you'll be able to go just about
anywhere, no matter how out of reach it seems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0050
rows.name:
And those nasty indigens that gave you trouble before?
Now you can fire on them from above with impunity![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0051
rows.name:
Also, your shots will be way more accurate because of
the vantage. I can't wait till I get a crack at it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0056
rows.name:
Wolf finally caught wind that I'd been calling him "the
Nutcracker." I was ready to get drawn and quartered...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0057
rows.name: But it was weird. He didn't get mad. Like, at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0058
rows.name:
Instead, he flashed this sort of agonized grimace and
mumbled something about how I was probably right.
Then he just...walked off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0059
rows.name: He looked totally defeated. It was scary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026601_MSG0060
rows.name: Did something finally crack the Nutcracker?[ST:wait ]
